powerUp module¶

class powerUp.PowerUp(surface)¶

Bases: entity.Entity

Class that handles powerups

do_sth(p)¶

Does something after being ‘taken’. :param Player p: player who has ‘taken’ the powerup

draw()¶

Draws powerup

reset()¶

Resets powerup

set_players(players)¶

Sets players. :param list players: list of players

set_track(track)¶

Sets ‘track’ surface. :param track: surface with track drawn on it
